p: AgNP stabilized with β-CD (AgNP-β-CD) was developed by Andrade et al. [ 18]. The aqueous NaOH, aqueous glucose and aqueous β-CD solutions were mixed and heated. An aqueous AgNO 3 solution was dropwise after the solution reached to 60 °C. After that, the reaction product was dialyzed with deionized water. Then, the stabilized AgNPs were lyophilized and AgNP-β-CD powder was obtained.
